name: ScholarEssay
tag_list: custom-writing, academic-writing, research, essay, essays, term-paper, capstone, research-paper, assignment, academic-help
overview:
ScholarEssay offers academic writing and editing services.

Products offered by ScholarEssay include essays, term papers, research papers, capstone, dissertations, book reports and more. The company sticks to high quality academic writing standards and creative approach towards projects worked on. Prices can be described as highly competitive and student-friendly with comprehensive discount system available.

Members of Writers’ Team hold a min of Masters agree in the respective area of study and undergo a highly selective admission process. Support Department works 24/7 and is available via various communication means. Intuitive order management system allows clients to track progress of the order and communicate with the writer directly.
